Namespace List

Here is a list of all namespaces with brief descriptions:
JSONThe JSON namespace should hold all public classes/functions/enums/structs of the libJSONpp library
JSON::convertCharacter-set conversion functions
JSON::datatypeA wrapper namespace to stop the datatype enum from polluting the JSON namespace. This also helps with IDE Auto-completion somewhat
JSON::errors
JSON::literalsA wrapper namespace to stop the literals enum from polluting the JSON namespace. This also helps with IDE Auto-completion somewhat
JSON::mapping_techniquesA wrapper-namespace around the mapping_techniques::mapping_techniques enum
